name: saltcorn
description: Saltcorn is a self-hosted no-code platform for building database-backed apps with visual builders. It includes roles, permissions, plugins, and a powerful UI for custom apps.
features: No-code builder: Create database-driven applications using visual builders without writing code.
Database management: Design tables, relationships, and schemas through an intuitive interface.
Custom views: Build forms, lists, and detail pages with drag-and-drop components.
Role-based access: Define user roles and permissions to control data and feature access.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community plugins or create custom extensions.
Workflow automation: Automate business logic with triggers, actions, and scheduled tasks.
API generation: Automatically generates REST APIs for all tables and custom endpoints.
Multi-database support: Works with PostgreSQL and SQLite for flexible deployment options.
Mobile responsive: Applications adapt automatically to mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.
Data validation: Enforce data integrity with built-in and custom validation rules.
File uploads: Handle file attachments with configurable storage and access controls.
Theming support: Customize appearance with themes and CSS overrides for branding.
